title: Part A
stimulusHtml: 1 point is earned for the graph three "humps", periodic behavior, starts at origin, reasonable relative max and min values

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for the intervals

<-1> each missing or incorrect interval

1 point is earned for the reason

Particle is moving to the left when

v( t )<0, i.e.   e 2sint <1. ( π,2π ),  ( 3π,4π )and( 5π,16 ]

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for no such time

1 point is earned for the reason

There is no such time because ∫ 0 T v(t)dt>0 for all T>0.
